originalText.text: My entire experience at laser away has been wonderful. Everyone is professional, caring and helpful. If you have questions or concerns you can call up and a nurse will get back to you. Highly recommend!!

text.text: My entire experience at laser away has been wonderful. Everyone is professional, caring and helpful. If you have questions or concerns you can call up and a nurse will get back to you. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text: Upper West Side location provides great service. Every time I arrive they are quick with getting me prepared for my laser tattoo removal. The staff and nurses are very friendly and make me feel comfortable. Scheduling appointments are quick and easy.

text.text: Upper West Side location provides great service. Every time I arrive they are quick with getting me prepared for my laser tattoo removal. The staff and nurses are very friendly and make me feel comfortable. Scheduling appointments are quick and easy.

originalText.text: I’ve been using LaserAway for years, but I believe the quality of their service has become unpredictable. For example, I had a maintenance plan that I had prepayed for of 3 services, and I left work early to arrive 20 minutes early to the office. My appointment was 4:15, and my technician came in around 4:30. The technician said I was only going to do 1 of the 3 services, and that she couldn’t answer my questions about my maintenance plan and that I would have to go to the front desk. I redressed and went to the front desk to confirm the plan I had paid for and what I had scheduled for, and then they said that I would no longer have time to do the 3 services I had scheduled. They were less than helpful in trying to find another appointment for me. How is it the patient’s fault that the technician was close to 15 minutes late? The time it took for the front staff to answer one question was less than one minute, so how is it fair or logical to insinuate that it was the patient’s fault in having to ask clarifying questions that was the reason for not having enough time to complete the treatments scheduled? I left extremely frustrated and had to call the official customer service number, who was able to reschedule me in a different location in less than 4 minutes.

originalText.text: The staff are very rude and not professional. It’s not first time when suddenly my visit is canceled or changed a time ( I think they make appointments for their friends etc) Please don’t buy packages because later they piss you off and always is problem with booking. Terrible place and people ar not interested what they do it.

originalText.text: I had the pleasure to be talking and being helped by Mateo. He is such a great listener, patient, understanding of your needs, and the best when it comes to paying attention to every little detail. Not to mention, he is incredibly sweet and provided me with exceptional services. I am simply grateful and I can’t wait for my next session!!! ❤️
